rows.label: qst202206_msg001
rows.name:
It's beautiful. I've never seen
anything like it...

rows.label: qst202206_msg002
rows.name:
I know, right? And we've got Raiko
to thank for this one!

rows.label: qst202206_msg003
rows.name: Aww, gee... Thanks so much!

rows.label: qst202206_msg004
rows.name:
Think you're starting to get the hang of
controlling your power now, Raiko?

rows.label: qst202206_msg005
rows.name:
Yeah, I'm totally fine with it now!
Thank you, thank you, thank you!

rows.label: qst202206_msg006
rows.name: Like, sooo much!

rows.label: qst202206_msg007
rows.name: Oh, we didn't do all that much, really.

rows.label: qst202206_msg008
rows.name:
I was gonna say! You're the one
that made this happen, Raiko.

rows.label: qst202206_msg009
rows.name:
Mmmm...nope! You were all helping
me out from the get-go. I couldn't've
done it without you guys!

rows.label: qst202206_msg010
rows.name: *sniffle...*

rows.label: qst202206_msg011
rows.name:
Whoa, hold on.
Are you crying there, Turtle-chan?!

rows.label: qst202206_msg012
rows.name:
I just... This must be how it feels to
see my own daughter growing up...

rows.label: qst202206_msg013
rows.name:
Daughter? I think you've got marriage
to worry about first there, buddy!

rows.label: qst202206_msg014
rows.name:
You overcame your own shortcomings,
Raiko. You're already coming along in
leaps and bounds.

rows.label: qst202206_msg015
rows.name: You've really done incredibly well.

rows.label: qst202206_msg016
rows.name: Thanks! I guess I do try!

rows.label: qst202206_msg017
rows.name: So can I, uh...ask you something?

rows.label: qst202206_msg018
rows.name: Sure.

rows.label: qst202206_msg019
rows.name:
Remember that kid who started crying
'cos of me back in Torigo?

rows.label: qst202206_msg020
rows.name: The one you zapped, yeah?

rows.label: qst202206_msg021
rows.name:
I kinda ran away 'cos I didn't like
my own powers back then...

rows.label: qst202206_msg022
rows.name:
But now, I feel like I should apologize
to the boy. If he starts crying again,
I want to help him this time.

rows.label: qst202206_msg023
rows.name:
I get it.
All right, let's go and look for him!

rows.label: qst202206_msg024
rows.name: What, really?!

rows.label: qst202206_msg025
rows.name:
Really. And this time, you can show
him just how far you've grown!

rows.label: qst202206_msg026
rows.name: Eeeeee, thank yooou!

rows.label: qst202206_msg027
rows.name:
We'll probably have to ask around
Torigo to work out where the kid
is. That fine with you?

rows.label: qst202206_msg029
rows.name: Totally!
